alert.note: Alert for Codington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 7:05PM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River Below Watertown affecting Codington County. North Fork Whetstone River near Milbank affecting Grant County. .Increased river flows have bounced from major severity down to moderate severity. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...River levels have dropped from Major to Moderate severity, and flooding continues. * WHERE...Big Sioux River Below Watertown. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11.7 feet, Water goes over the low spot on the road 300 feet east of the gauging location * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 PM CDT Wednesday was 12.1 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued early Friday morning by 400 AM CDT.
